trans-unit.source: Registered customer information
trans-unit.target: Registered customer information

trans-unit.source: Enrich your stats, add information about your registered customers and learn more about them!
trans-unit.target: Enrich your stats, add information about your registered customers and learn more about them!

trans-unit.source: Target your audience
trans-unit.target: Target your audience

trans-unit.source: In order for each message to have an impact, you need to know who it is being addressed to.
trans-unit.target: In order for each message to have an impact, you need to know who it is being addressed to.

trans-unit.source: Defining your target audience is essential when choosing the right tools to win them over.
trans-unit.target: Defining your target audience is essential when choosing the right tools to win them over.

trans-unit.source: It is best to limit an action to a group -- or to groups -- of clients.
trans-unit.target: It is best to limit an action to a group -- or to groups -- of clients.

trans-unit.source: Storing registered customer information allows you to accurately define customer profiles so you can adapt your special deals and promotions.
trans-unit.target: Storing registered customer information allows you to accurately define customer profiles so you can adapt your special deals and promotions.

trans-unit.source: You can increase your sales by:
trans-unit.target: You can increase your sales by:

trans-unit.source: Launching targeted advertisement campaigns.
trans-unit.target: Launching targeted advertisement campaigns.

trans-unit.source: Contacting a group of clients by email or newsletter.
trans-unit.target: Contacting a group of clients by email or newsletter.

trans-unit.source: Gender distribution allows you to determine the percentage of men and women shoppers on your store.
trans-unit.target: Gender distribution allows you to determine the percentage of men and women shoppers on your store.

trans-unit.source: CSV Export
trans-unit.target: CSV Export

trans-unit.source: Age ranges allow you to better understand target demographics.
trans-unit.target: Age ranges allow you to better understand target demographics.

trans-unit.source: Country distribution allows you to analyze which part of the World your customers are shopping from.
trans-unit.target: Country distribution allows you to analyze which part of the World your customers are shopping from.

trans-unit.source: Currency range allows you to determine which currency your customers are using.
trans-unit.target: Currency range allows you to determine which currency your customers are using.

trans-unit.source: Language distribution allows you to analyze the browsing language used by your customers.
trans-unit.target: Language distribution allows you to analyze the browsing language used by your customers.
